prompt: This scanned document is contains Vietnamese and English text. Some text could be hand written while others are printed. The page contains headers, tables, and body. Extract metadata as key-value pairs from the top part of the page only. If there is a table, return the table as a records oriented json. If there is content in the body, return those contents as a body. You should return a json with the following keys, 'metadata', 'tables', and 'body'. If any of these is not present, set the corresponding value to 'NA'.
